full_summary:
# Request for Proposal (RFP) for Policy Writing Services

## Brief Description

The House of Commons seeks to engage a supplier to provide policy writing services on an as-need basis.

### Overview

The Contracting Authority is responsible for providing internal policy instruments that align with the organizational priorities and objectives. To achieve this, suppliers are required to lead or participate in consultations with managers and subject matter experts from the organization.

## Requirements

* Suppliers will develop internal policy instruments based on organizational priorities and objectives
* Suppliers will lead or participate in consultations with managers and subject matter experts from the organization
* Resources will be provided by the Corporate Policy Branch to guide the development of policy instruments
